content.text:
{"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":203682,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかし、居心地の悪さはまったく感じない。","translatedEnglishLine":"However, I don't feel any discomfort at all."},{"lineNumber":203683,"originalJapaneseLine":"むしろ落ち着くとあなたは思った。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rather, you thought it was calming."},{"lineNumber":203684,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんとなく、","translatedEnglishLine":"Somehow,"},{"lineNumber":203685,"originalJapaneseLine":"まったりとした時間が流れる。","translatedEnglishLine":"a relaxed time flows by."},{"lineNumber":203686,"originalJapaneseLine":"「明日、死ぬなよな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Don't die tomorrow, okay?\""},{"lineNumber":203687,"originalJapaneseLine":"突然、長田君はそんなことを言い出した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Suddenly, Nagata-kun said something like that."},{"lineNumber":203688,"originalJapaneseLine":"「俺、まだお前と行きてー場所が沢山あるしさ、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I still have a lot of places I want to go with you,"},{"lineNumber":203689,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あとあと、お前ってどっかボーッとしてっから","translatedEnglishLine":"and also, you're kind of spacey sometimes,"},{"lineNumber":203690,"originalJapaneseLine":"　マジ心配なんだよな……そのぉ、アレとしては」","translatedEnglishLine":"so I'm seriously worried... well, as your, um, friend.\""},{"lineNumber":203691,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え？　アレが何かって？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh? What do you mean by 'that'?\""},{"lineNumber":203692,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おま、ばっか、空気読めよ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You idiot, read the atmosphere..."},{"lineNumber":203693,"originalJapaneseLine":"　い、いや……アレだって……」","translatedEnglishLine":"N-no... I mean, that...\""},{"lineNumber":203694,"originalJapaneseLine":"「親友って奴？　としては、さ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Like, as your best friend, you know.\""},{"lineNumber":203695,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……へへへっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hehehe.\""},{"lineNumber":203696,"originalJapaneseLine":"少し、長田君は照れ臭そうだった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Nagata-kun looked a little embarrassed."},{"lineNumber":203697,"originalJapaneseLine":"長田君にとってあなたは、親友らしい。","translatedEnglishLine":"To Nagata-kun, you seem to be a best friend."},{"lineNumber":203698,"originalJapaneseLine":"親友のいなかったあなたに、","translatedEnglishLine":"For you, who had no best friends,"},{"lineNumber":203699,"originalJapaneseLine":"初めて、親友と呼べる相手が出来た。","translatedEnglishLine":"for the first time, you found someone you could call your best friend."},{"lineNumber":203700,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ、なあなあ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, hey!"},{"lineNumber":203701,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔王倒し終わったらよ、また冒険行こうぜ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"After we finish defeating the Demon King, let's go on another adventure!\""},{"lineNumber":203702,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今、チラッと言ったけどよ、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I just said it briefly, but,"},{"lineNumber":203703,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺まだまだ行きたい場所あんだよね！」","translatedEnglishLine":"there are still so many places I want to go!\""},{"lineNumber":203704,"originalJapaneseLine":"「な、な、これ約束な！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Th-this is a promise, okay!"},{"lineNumber":203705,"originalJapaneseLine":"　絶対の絶対だかんな！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Absolutely, absolutely!\""},{"lineNumber":203706,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたはそんな約束を長田君とした。","translatedEnglishLine":"You made such a promise with Nagata-kun."},{"lineNumber":203707,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"........"},{"lineNumber":203708,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":203709,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたは『親友』の長田君と","translatedEnglishLine":"You spent time with Nagata-kun, your 'best friend',"},

{"lineNumber":203710,"originalJapaneseLine":"かけがえのない時間を過ごした。","translatedEnglishLine":"spending irreplaceable moments."},

{"lineNumber":203711,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして……","translatedEnglishLine":"And then..."},

{"lineNumber":203712,"originalJapaneseLine":"運命の朝を迎える。","translatedEnglishLine":"the fateful morning arrives."},

{"lineNumber":203713,"originalJapaneseLine":"「って、あっれー？　＜エール＞？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"H-hey, what's this? <Yell>?\" "},

{"lineNumber":203714,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたの前に現れたのは長田君だった。","translatedEnglishLine":"The one who appeared before you was Nagata-kun."},

{"lineNumber":203715,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………。」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\" "},

{"lineNumber":203716,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh...\""},

{"lineNumber":203717,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これ、他の奴には言うなよ？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Don't tell this to anyone else, okay?"},

{"lineNumber":203718,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前だから言うんだからな？」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm telling you because it's you, alright?\""},

{"lineNumber":203719,"originalJapaneseLine":"何を照れているのだろう。","translatedEnglishLine":"I wonder why he's embarrassed."},

{"lineNumber":203720,"originalJapaneseLine":"長田君は居心地悪そうに髪の毛をかき上げる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Nagata-kun awkwardly runs his hand through his hair."},

{"lineNumber":203721,"originalJapaneseLine":"「格好悪いんだけどよぉ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's uncool, but..."},

{"lineNumber":203722,"originalJapaneseLine":"　正直、明日が決戦かと思うと緊張しちまって……","translatedEnglishLine":"Honestly, knowing tomorrow is the final battle makes me nervous..."},

{"lineNumber":203723,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なーんか眠れそうにないんだよなぁ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I feel like I won’t be able to sleep at all.\" "},

{"lineNumber":203724,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おっ、マジで！？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, really!?"},

{"lineNumber":203725,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あははは、だーよなー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ahahaha, right?!"},

{"lineNumber":203726,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なーんか明日を楽しみにしてるっぽい、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It seems like Zansu and Lerikoff are just the weird ones, looking forward to tomorrow,"},

{"lineNumber":203727,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ザンスとかレリコフがおかしいだけだよなー」","translatedEnglishLine":"while we're normal, right?\""},

{"lineNumber":203728,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あーっ、＜エール＞も同じって知ったら安心した」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, I felt relieved when I found out <Yell> feels the same.\" "},

{"lineNumber":203729,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よいしょっ、と」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright then.\" "},

{"lineNumber":203730,"originalJapaneseLine":"長田君はあなたの向かいのソファーに腰を下ろした。","translatedEnglishLine":"Nagata-kun sat down on the sofa opposite you."},

{"lineNumber":203731,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Haa...\" "},

{"lineNumber":203732,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今日は楽しかったなぁ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Today was fun."},

{"lineNumber":203733,"originalJapaneseLine":"　風呂は良かったし、飯も美味い」","translatedEnglishLine":"The bath was nice, and the food was delicious.\" "},

{"lineNumber":203734,"originalJapaneseLine":"「俺もうここに住んじゃいたいなぁ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I almost want to live here."},

{"lineNumber":203735,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ははっ、なんてな」","translatedEnglishLine":"Haha, just kidding.\" "},

{"lineNumber":203736,"originalJapaneseLine":"ロビーにはあなた達以外、誰もいない。","translatedEnglishLine":"There was no one else in the lobby besides the two of you."},

{"lineNumber":203737,"originalJapaneseLine":"二人の会話もどこか途切れ途切れ。","translatedEnglishLine":"The conversation between you two was somehow broken up."},

{"lineNumber":203738,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかし、居心地の悪さはまったく感じない。","translatedEnglishLine":"However, there was no sense of discomfort at all."},

{"lineNumber":203739,"originalJapaneseLine":"むしろ落ち着くとあなたは思った。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rather, you thought it was calming."},

{"lineNumber":203740,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんとなく、","translatedEnglishLine":"Somehow,"},

{"lineNumber":203741,"originalJapaneseLine":"まったりとした時間が流れる。","translatedEnglishLine":"a relaxed time flows by."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、居心地の悪さはまったく感じない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, I don't feel any discomfort at all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: むしろ落ち着くとあなたは思った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rather, you thought it was calming.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとなく、
まったりとした時間が流れる。
「明日、死ぬなよな」
突然、長田君はそんなことを言い出した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suddenly, Nagata-kun said something like that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺、まだお前と行きてー場所が沢山あるしさ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I still have a lot of places I want to go with you,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あとあと、お前ってどっかボーッとしてっから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and also, you're kind of spacey sometimes,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジ心配なんだよな……そのぉ、アレとしては」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so I'm seriously worried... well, as your, um, friend."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「え？　アレが何かって？」
「おま、ばっか、空気読めよ……
い、いや……アレだって……」
「親友って奴？　としては、さ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Like, as your best friend, you know."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……へへへっ」
少し、長田君は照れ臭そうだった。
長田君にとってあなたは、親友らしい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To Nagata-kun, you seem to be a best friend.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 親友のいなかったあなたに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For you, who had no best friends,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 初めて、親友と呼べる相手が出来た。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: for the first time, you found someone you could call your best friend.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ、なあなあ！
魔王倒し終わったらよ、また冒険行こうぜ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After we finish defeating the Demon King, let's go on another adventure!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今、チラッと言ったけどよ、
俺まだまだ行きたい場所あんだよね！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there are still so many places I want to go!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な、な、これ約束な！
絶対の絶対だかんな！」
あなたはそんな約束を長田君とした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You made such a promise with Nagata-kun.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたは『親友』の長田君と
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You spent time with Nagata-kun, your 'best friend',

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かけがえのない時間を過ごした。
そして……
運命の朝を迎える。
「って、あっれー？　＜エール＞？」
あなたの前に現れたのは長田君だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The one who appeared before you was Nagata-kun.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これ、他の奴には言うなよ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Don't tell this to anyone else, okay?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前だから言うんだからな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm telling you because it's you, alright?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何を照れているのだろう。
長田君は居心地悪そうに髪の毛をかき上げる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nagata-kun awkwardly runs his hand through his hair.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「格好悪いんだけどよぉ……
正直、明日が決戦かと思うと緊張しちまって……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Honestly, knowing tomorrow is the final battle makes me nervous...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なーんか眠れそうにないんだよなぁ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I feel like I won’t be able to sleep at all."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おっ、マジで！？
あははは、だーよなー！」
「なーんか明日を楽しみにしてるっぽい、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It seems like Zansu and Lerikoff are just the weird ones, looking forward to tomorrow,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザンスとかレリコフがおかしいだけだよなー」
「あーっ、＜エール＞も同じって知ったら安心した」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, I felt relieved when I found out <Yell> feels the same."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よいしょっ、と」
長田君はあなたの向かいのソファーに腰を下ろした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nagata-kun sat down on the sofa opposite you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今日は楽しかったなぁ。
風呂は良かったし、飯も美味い」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The bath was nice, and the food was delicious."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺もうここに住んじゃいたいなぁ。
ははっ、なんてな」
ロビーにはあなた達以外、誰もいない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There was no one else in the lobby besides the two of you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人の会話もどこか途切れ途切れ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The conversation between you two was somehow broken up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、居心地の悪さはまったく感じない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, there was no sense of discomfort at all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: むしろ落ち着くとあなたは思った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rather, you thought it was calming.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとなく、
まったりとした時間が流れる。

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

output_text:

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rather, you thought it was calming.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For you, who had no best friends,

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: for the first time, you found someone you could call your best friend.

あなたはそんな約束を長田君とした。

そして……

あなたの前に現れたのは長田君だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The one who appeared before you was Nagata-kun.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これ、他の奴には言うなよ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Don't tell this to anyone else, okay?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前だから言うんだからな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm telling you because it's you, alright?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何を照れているのだろう。
長田君は居心地悪そうに髪の毛をかき上げる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nagata-kun awkwardly runs his hand through his hair.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「格好悪いんだけどよぉ……
正直、明日が決戦かと思うと緊張しちまって……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Honestly, knowing tomorrow is the final battle makes me nervous...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なーんか眠れそうにないんだよなぁ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I feel like I won’t be able to sleep at all."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おっ、マジで！？
あははは、だーよなー！」
「なーんか明日を楽しみにしてるっぽい、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It seems like Zansu and Lerikoff are just the weird ones, looking forward to tomorrow,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザンスとかレリコフがおかしいだけだよなー」
「あーっ、＜エール＞も同じって知ったら安心した」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, I felt relieved when I found out <Yell> feels the same."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よいしょっ、と」
長田君はあなたの向かいのソファーに腰を下ろした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nagata-kun sat down on the sofa opposite you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今日は楽しかったなぁ。
風呂は良かったし、飯も美味い」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The bath was nice, and the food was delicious."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺もうここに住んじゃいたいなぁ。
ははっ、なんてな」
ロビーにはあなた達以外、誰もいない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There was no one else in the lobby besides the two of you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人の会話もどこか途切れ途切れ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The conversation between you two was somehow broken up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、居心地の悪さはまったく感じない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, there was no sense of discomfort at all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: むしろ落ち着くとあなたは思った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rather, you thought it was calming.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとなく、
まったりとした時間が流れる。
